name: JubiLite (Michael Anderson) (Michael Anderson)
description:
Welcome to JubiLite! 

JubiLite is a top down rhythm game where you  want to dodge the enemies and stay on the beat. The game is being produced by a small team at LitterBox Games (Which I co founded) and is responsible for 100% of all content in the game. At LitterBox I work as the lead level designer and a gameplay programmer. I have worked closely with my team to create the tight mechanics seen in JubiLite and have personally be responsible for all of the level design.

Note: This is a web build of a mobile game so apologies if it is a little buggy.
